The capital is Damaturu. It was created on 27 August 1991. == Local government areas == The state consists of 17 local government areas including: * Bade * Bursari * Damaturu * Geidam * Gujba * Gulani * Fika * Fune * Jakusko * Karasuwa * Machina * Nangere * Nguru * Potiskum * Tarmuwa * Yunusari * Yusufari == References == Category:1990s establishments in Nigeria Category:1991 establishments in Africa Category:Yobe State
title: Yobe State
